name: tic-tac-toe
description: Tic Tac Toe game with AI opponent

scripts.test:e2e: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:8080 'cd e2e-tests && npm test'
scripts.test:e2e:headed: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:8080 'cd e2e-tests && npm run test:headed'
scripts.test:e2e:ui: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:8080 'cd e2e-tests && npm run test:ui'
scripts.test:e2e:debug: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:8080 'cd e2e-tests && npm run test:debug'
